title: Game crashing as soon as i load in
body:
So after the last windows 10 update i have been able to play league because as soon as the champions begin to spawn in the beginning of a game my computer/client crashes and it wont let me force quit or even leave the froze screen without restarting my whole computer i made a ticket about 20 hours ago still yet to get a  response and I've gone through everything on the support page to fix the crash and it still occurs 

Also the first two times it crashed were in ranked games so now i have a leaver buster i'm not requesting the lost LP to be restored but i am asking for possible solutions and the leaver buster to be removed as i would like to play the game

as for details about the crash all i can say is my computer freezes and emits a loud buzzing noise, and yes this pc can handle league as this is my main device for playing

replies.body:
It sounds like you might have outdated drivers or corrupt game files that are causing you to crash.  I recommend going through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get this fixed up.  If it comes to requiring a repair, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) which will help with an automatic clean slate.  

Leaverbuster is not something that we can remove, and leaving still causes negative experiences even if unintentional.  Best to way to overcome that is through playing without interruptions.  Let me know if you have any questions!
thank you very much turns out i had redownload .Net Framework 3.5 because it updated to 4.0 and thanks most all for the reply since my ticket still hasn't gotten a reply
